title: Python Data Types
description: Work with integers, floats, strings, and booleans in Python.

examples.input:
x = 10
y = 3.5
name = 'Hanna'
isStudent = True
print(x, y, name, isStudent)

constraints: Declare variables of all four basic data types.
Print each variable and its type using type().
hints: Use type(variable) to check the data type.
Booleans evaluate to True or False.
